Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item comes with a unique blend of quality and functionality that truly stands out in its category. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $120. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to own a piece that is both practical and prestigious. I look forward to hearing your response and the chance to share this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
